name: Dialogues with Books
description: Dialogues with Books Join us for our book club meetup every third Sunday of the month. Bring along your favorite book, the book you are currently reading, or any book that had an impact on you. Share your experience reading the book with fellow bibliophiles and participate in winding and fun discussions around the joy of reading. Do all this while sipping on coffee/tea or having a hot tasty snack from our cafe! Your Host - Bharat is an avid reader with a penchant for classical literature and philosophy. He also dabbles in writing with a diverse portfolio of works across tech, philosophy, magical realism and fantasy. His reading diet includes a mix of fiction and non-fiction with his favorite novels being The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Movable feast by Hemmingway and Crime and Punishment by Dostoevsky.Note: Rs.100 as cover is part of the ticket price.

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

name: Dialogues Poetry Open Mic
description: Lovers of poetry and prose — this one is for you!Whether you like listening, reading or performing poems or short stories, be ready to be entertained. We are on a journey to create safe spaces for the writers in town — to share their writing with like-minded people and become part of our community. You can hold us accountable for making you have a good time!Join us at Dialogues Cafe,Koramangala from 7:30 PM onwards, on every 3rd Sunday

name: A 2 Day Natural Fitness Kalaripayattu Workshop
description: We are hosting a 2-day Live Kalaripayattu workshop on 15th & 16 Feb 2025 (Saturday & Sunday)We are bringing to you Specially curated exercises inspired from Kalaripayattu that can be practised at the comfort of your home.What's included in the Workshop:A 2 Day Live workshop provided by Experienced Kalaripayattu Teachers on 15th & 16 Feb 2025 eachThere would be 1.5 hours of a Online session 1 week prior to the workshop to brief you about the workshop and to provide Theoretical Introduction to the Kalaripayattu movements and to address other question and answers.Support through whatsapp / Call in future.This workshop is open for both Adults and Kids. There movements would be different and according to the respective age groupsBenefits of attending this Workshop:Learn Scientific , Natural Kalaripayattu Movements as a fitness routine to include in your day to day Lifestyle (no equipments required)Improve Mental Focus & MindfulnessDevelop A Stronger, Healthier Spine

location.address: 3rd Floor, MSK Plaza, 100 Feet Road, 3rd Main Rd, above Cafe coffee day, Defence Colony, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038, India

name: Linocut Printing Beginner's Workshop
description: Linocut Printing Beginners Workshop  A linocut is a type of relief or block print, and bears a lot of similarities to woodblock printing. Essentially, the artist carves an image into a linoleum (lino) block and what's left of the block is inked and printed In this workshop you will be learning to transfer, carve and print a lino block. All the materials will be provided. The tools will be provided only for use. No prior experience required, we will teach you from scratch. You take home your carved block with 2 prints. 🖼️🖼️ We’ll be teaching a black and white composition. If you have a composition in mind that you want to work on, you can get the sketch or a print out of it. If you don’t have anything specific in mind, you choose from the references we have. Join us at Studio Sakura 🌸 to unleash your creativity and experience the magic of printmaking.

name: Strength & Flow Series : Arm Balance Workshop
description: The next workshop in our Strength and Flow Series with Shruti is an arm balance workshop .Designed for all levels, Shruti’s workshop challenges both physical and mental resilience. Expect a series of arm balances, enabling you to get stronger and gain the benefits that come with holding arm balances. This workshop encourages you to sit with discomfort, move through it, and emerge stronger—mentally and physically. As Shruti says, “It won’t be easy,” but the growth will be worth it.After class, you can expect a protein-packed smoothie.Let’s start the year strong with nourishment and community. 🌱

name: One Year of WIP | February 8
description: Welcome to Wine in Progress (WIP)At WIP, we're all about keeping it real, unpretentious, and oh-so-welcoming—just like your favorite backyard hangout, but with a fabulous upgrade! Whether you're a wine connoisseur or just looking to wine down, we've got you covered with curated delights that'll tickle your taste buds and leave you craving more.We are a tiny 14-seater dive bar for wine (with 3 outdoor picnic tables), so book a table with us if you want to snag a seat. We’ve got bottles of curated wines, Japanese small plates by Naru Noodle Bar, and music to set the vibe just right.One-Year of WIPThe Wine in Progress crew is celebrating its first anniversary with a bang! Joining us for the day are the boys from Bandra—Chefs Gresham and Manoj—who will be cooking up a storm with their special menu.On the decks, from 7:30 PM to 9:30 PM, Kristel sets the vibe with her smooth and fun "Groovy Theory," guaranteed to have you dancing in your seats. After that, Chef Gresh takes over, spinning funky house and nu-disco beats to keep the party going.It’s going to be a night of great food, groovy tunes, and unforgettable vibes—don’t miss it!If you’d like to drop by WIP on a regular day, just click this link here. Please Note :The booking fee is only redeemable against the wine menu and WIP Food menu only.Our bar offers seating for 8 individuals at the bar itself, as well as 3 two-seater tables.As a small, cozy bar, we may occasionally need to join tables, so expect to brush elbows! If you have specific requirements, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.To ease operations, the bar team may reallocate your seats despite your preferences to ensure the best overall experience for all guests. In such cases, seating will be determined by the WIP Team at their discretion.We kindly request payments via alternative methods, as we do not accept cash transactions.All sales are final. Rescheduling must be requested at least 48 hours in advance, with only one opportunity to reschedule. In the event of a cancellation or no-show, payments are non-refundable.We allocate tables in 2-hour time slots to accommodate as many guests as possible and appreciate your understanding. Our team will notify you 15 minutes before your time is up.

name: "A Journey Within"
description: Event 1: 9th February 2025Title of event 1: The Love Languages Experience What Happens:●    Activity 1: An Icebreaker sharing or game●    Activity 2: Brief introduction to the 5 Love Languages through stories.●    Activity 3: Participants take a quick quiz to identify their love language.●    Activity 4: Group activity: Pair participants to create scenarios or gestures to express each love language ●    Activity 5: Pick an Oracle card●    Takeaway: Each person creates for themselves a personalized "Love Language Card" with tips on how to nurture their relationship with themselves and others. Event 2: 16th February 2025Title of event 2: Love Letters: The Art of Expressing AffectionWhat Happens:●    Activity 1: Icebreaker sharing/game (may include sharing memorable moments of receiving or writing a love letter)●    A short guided meditation on Compassion & Unconditional Love●    Activity 2: Guided session on crafting a heartfelt letter (whether for romantic love, self-love, or appreciation for friends/family).●    Activity 3: Optional sharing of letters in small groups or anonymously posting them on a “Wall of Love” at the café.●    Takeaway: Beautiful stationery or a postcard to encourage participants to continue writing love letters since the world needs more love letters  Event 3: 23rd February 2025Title for event 3: Love Yourself First: A Self-Love WorkshopTheme: Building Self-Compassion and Confidence What Happens: ●    Activity 1: Icebreaker ●    Quick mindfulness meditation to connect with self.●    Activity 2: Fun reflective exercise: “What I Love About Me” (participants list their strengths and joys).●    Oracle cards on love your body – each participant can pick one and journal for a few mins what it means to them, or share in a sharing circle●    Activity 3: Group activity: Create a "Self-Love Jar" with affirmations or small acts of kindness participants can gift themselves.●    Takeaway: A jar filled with affirmations or prompts to practice self-love regularly.

location.address: 1316/F, 1316/E, 18 B Main Rd, near VLCC BEAUTY CLINIC ( JP Nagar, Bangalore ), Marenahalli, 2nd Phase, J. P. Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560078, India

organizer.name: The Kind Roastery and Brew Room

name: The Himalayan Table - A Garhwali Food Pop Up
description: Welcome to Shades of Garhwal - a traveling kitchen to promote the culinary delights from the Garhwal region.We may have pursued very different careers, but we share a deep love for food and how it connects us to the world. For us, exploring a new country isn’t complete without a visit to the local grocery stores to discover fresh produce and unique ingredients. Cooking and hosting have always been second nature to us, and as proud Pahadi women, we’ve embarked on a journey to rediscover and preserve the rich culinary heritage of the Garhwal region.For us, food is more than just sustenance—it’s a way to connect, to share, and to bond. Through this pop-up, we want to bring people together to savor authentic Garhwali flavors while immersing in the history, culture, and traditions that make each dish special. It’s not just a meal; it’s a celebration of heritage and a chance to create meaningful memories around the table.We hope to see you soon! ❤️- Salomi & Pushkina

name: Colour Reduction Linocut Printing Workshop
description: Colour Reduction Linocut Printing Workshop 1 day workshop All the materials will be provided. The tools will be provided only for use. No prior experience required, we will teach you from scratch.You take home your carved block with 2 prints. We’ll be teaching colour reduction linocut. The size of the block is A5. We will be printing a colour linocut with two layers of colour depending on the composition. If you have a composition in mind that you want to work on, you can get the sketch or a print out of it. If you don’t have anything specific in mind, you choose from the references we have.*Please keep in mind to choose a simple composition. Avoid compositions that require a lot of intricate carving.*Please reach the venue by 11am. Avoid wearing light coloured clothes.Join us at Studio Sakura 🌸 to unleash your creativity and experience the magic of printmaking.

name: Drypoint Etching Beginner's Workshop
description: Drypoint Printing Workshop"Drypoint on acrylic sheet" refers to the printmaking technique of creating an image by scratching lines into a sheet of acrylic using a sharp tool, essentially "drypointing" on a plastic surface instead of the traditional copper plate, allowing you to then ink and press the plate onto paper to produce a printIn this workshop you will be learning how to make a drypoint plate using an acrylic sheet and how to print it. All the materials will be provided. The tools will be provided only for use. No prior experience required, we will teach you from scratch. You take home your carved plate with 2 prints. 🖼️🖼️ If you have a composition in mind that you want to work on, please get a sketch or a print out of it.  *Please keep in mind to choose a simple composition. Avoid compositions that require a lot of intricate carving.*Please reach the venue by 11am. Avoid wearing light coloured clothes.Join us at Studio Sakura 🌸 to unleash your creativity and experience the magic of printmaking.

description: For all the fans of popular sitcom FRIENDS you probably get why the name Lobster Meets.For all those looking for their lobster, new friends or just meet new people Lobster Meets is the place to be.Lobster Meets by Lobster Search is a socialising event for verified* singles.Our aim is to facilitate interaction amongst as many singles as possible in a warm, fun and lively environment.While we take no guarantees of cupid striking, we suggest you come with an open mind, as you may find a friend, a person with similar interests or potentially your forever person!We also pride in maintaining over 90% gender ratio at all our events!See you at the event!ONLY 26+ PLEASE!

name: Linocut Printing Workshop, Studio Sakura×MyBoTree
description: Celebrate the month of love in a creative way! Studio Sakura is teaming up with MyBoTree to bring you a unique linocut printing session on Saturday, 15th Feb.🌸Whether you're looking for a fun activity with your family, friends, or partner, this is the perfect way to get your hands inked and hearts inspired!  Create your own beautiful prints while enjoying a relaxing, artistic experience in a cozy environment.All the materials will be provided. The tools will be provided only for use. No prior experience required, we will teach you from scratch. You take home your carved A5 block with 1 print. We’ll be teaching a black and white composition. If you have a composition in mind that you want to work on, please get the sketch or a print out of it. If you don’t have anything specific in mind, you can choose from the references we have. Spaces are limited, so don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity to make something special! Registrations close on 14th Feb.

name: Besties Brunch - Galentine's Day Special
description: Besties Brunch : A Celebration of Female Friendships! 💖Join us for a heartwarming brunch @ Monkey Bar dedicated to the incredible bond between women!Besties Brunch is all about celebrating the friendships that uplift, inspire, and empower us.Whether you’re catching up with your closest pals or meeting new friends, this event promises a vibrant atmosphere filled with laughter and connection.Here's What You Can Expect *Delicious Brunch with Mocktails / Cocktails:* Indulge in a delightful spread that caters to every palate, from sweet treats to savory delights. *Empowering Conversations & Genuine Connections:* Share stories, support each other, and celebrate the unique journeys of women.-*Inclusive & Safe Environment:* Come solo or bring your squad; all women are welcome to join this celebration of sisterhood.Let’s raise a glass to the amazing women in our lives who make every moment brighter. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to connect and create unforgettable memories with your besties! 💕

description: About PicnicJoin us under the canopy of our lush city oasis for a sun-soaked (fingers crossed!) afternoon filled with board games, wine, coffee, and irresistible picnic platesPicnic Plates by SUBKOMeetha | Craft BakesSubko Croissant - Rs. 230Subko PAC - Rs. 305Banana Chocolate Cake - Rs. 325Stuffed Cookie: Salted Notella - Rs. 450Stuffed Cookie (Pistaaah) - Rs. 450Subko Basque (Vanilla) - Rs. 495Craft Sandwiches (Sandwiches come in half and full sizes )Noir Wheat Sandwich - Rs. 530 (Noir wheat is only available in full size)The Grinch - RS. 275/550Harissa Grilled Cheese - Rs. 295/595Harissa Grilled Chicken - Rs. 295/595Bacon and Caramelized Onion - Rs. 345/635_________And don’t forget—your furry friends are welcome to join the fun too!See you at the yard for a perfect day out with great food, great coffee, and even better company. name: Courtyard Picnic with SUBKO
description: About PicnicJoin us under the canopy of our lush city oasis for a sun-soaked (fingers crossed!) afternoon filled with board games, wine, coffee, and irresistible picnic platesPicnic Plates by SUBKOMeetha | Craft BakesSubko Croissant - Rs. 230Subko PAC - Rs. 305Banana Chocolate Cake - Rs. 325Stuffed Cookie: Salted Notella - Rs. 450Stuffed Cookie (Pistaaah) - Rs. 450Subko Basque (Vanilla) - Rs. 495Craft Sandwiches (Sandwiches come in half and full sizes )Noir Wheat Sandwich - Rs. 530 (Noir wheat is only available in full size)The Grinch - RS. 275/550Harissa Grilled Cheese - Rs. 295/595Harissa Grilled Chicken - Rs. 295/595Bacon and Caramelized Onion - Rs. 345/635_________And don’t forget—your furry friends are welcome to join the fun too!See you at the yard for a perfect day out with great food, great coffee, and even better company. Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Bringing outside food into the yard area is not permitted.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. In such cases, a full refund for the ticket will be issued.

name: Courtyard Kids Playdate | Valentine’s with Family
description: Courtyard's monthly playdate with The LooRoo Club is back!This Valentine’s season, we’re celebrating love in all its forms—family, friendship, and the joy of being together. Little Hearts, Big Love is a heartwarming family playdate designed for parents and children to bond over creative, playful experiences in a relaxed outdoor setting.Set amidst the open spaces of The Courtyard, this morning picnic will feature:Messy Play – Paint, clay, and hands-on creativityCollaborative Art – Fun DIY projects for kids and parentsOutdoor Games – Classic family-friendly activitiesPicnic & Play – A cozy setup for quality time togetherFor children aged 3 to 8 years, accompanied by a parent.﻿Terms and ConditionsThe management bears no responsibility for any injury or damage incurred during the event.Purchase tickets exclusively from the designated ticketing platform.No refunds for no-shows or cancellations under any circumstances.Tickets are non-transferable and intended for personal use only.Event schedule and menu subject to change in case of emergencies or events beyond our control.The management will not entertain liability claims arising from the consumption of food or beverages.Parking near the event venue is at the vehicle owner's risk. Paid valet parking available at Rs. 200 per car.Ticket holders grant organizers perpetual rights to use any recorded video or still footage of their appearance on any channel, without further approval.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. In such cases, a full refund for the ticket will be issued.

name: Wine Tasting: Wine, Cheese and Wanderlust
description: Bangalore wine lovers – get ready for a sensory wine escapade like no other!Join us at the easy, breezy Olive Beach for a super fun evening of discovering 5 stunning wines from around the world, each as breathtaking as the regions they come from. Sip along with Sommelier Devati Mallick (Founder, Drink With D Wine Experiences) as she takes you on a tasting journey through some of the world’s most picturesque wine regions—from the rolling vineyards of Tuscany to the sun-drenched Rhône Valley, the whitewashed island wineries of Greece, and the enchanting canals of Venice.Bangalore-based Melchior Cheese is putting together a heavenly cheese grazing table, featuring their bestselling styles, while Olive Beach is serving up delicious small plates to complement the wines. Add to that the best company—our fun and welcoming wine community in the city—and you've got an evening that's nothing short of magic.Pack your palate and join us for this epic wine and cheese escape—no boarding pass required!

location.address: 16, Wood St, near Karnataka Bank, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

organizer.name: Drink With D
organizer.description: DWD is a Sommelier-led wine consulting and wine experience brand. Join us in exploring the fascinating world of wine through fun tastings and curated experiences!

name: The Analog Club
description: Step back in time at The Analog Club, a new event series by the Studio by Copper + Cloves. Imagine walking into a busy cafe and seeing not a single phone, no-one taking selfies and no one around you scrolling. Disconnect from devices for 3 hours of unplugged experience—we'll have books, board games, music, crochet, and of course, food! But this isn't about structured activities or organised fun, just genuine connection and relaxation. The event will be fluid- you can dip into activities if you want, or you can just chat to new people or graze at our high tea counter!Meet new friends, sketch, or read a book in quiet solitude (without being surrounded by people lost in their phones). We will not be doing social media on our phones at the event, we will only take photos with a camera.Embrace the analog experience, slow down, and reconnect in this crazy digital age! **Strictly no devices (no laptops, ipads, and you will be asked to keep your phone in a basket or in your bag- not in your pocket and no where on a table**Tickets are for entry and unlimited high tea from our renowned deli counter.

location.name: Copper + Cloves

organizer.name: Copper + Cloves

name: Movie Under the Stars | Film: Before Sunrise
description: Join us for an open-air screening of Before Sunrise (1995), with a three-course dinner by Chef Matthew and popcorn.*Wines and other beverages will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieBefore Sunrise (1995) is the ultimate film about chance encounters and deep, lingering conversations—the kind that make you believe in love, even if just for a night. Jesse and Céline meet on a train, decide to wander Vienna together, and spend the night talking about everything and nothing, knowing they only have until sunrise. It’s intimate, romantic, and filled with the kind of magic that only happens when two people truly connect.Now, imagine watching this under the stars with your favorite person, wrapped in the open air, with a cozy three-course dinner to set the mood. It’s the perfect way to celebrate love—whether it’s a grand romance or just a quiet moment shared over good food and a great story.A special Valentine’s Day 3-course dinner by Chef Matthew from Ma Baker—menu reveal coming soon!______Terms and ConditionsThe management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. In such cases, a full refund for the ticket will be issued.

name: HighQ: A Eventful Quiz Night!
description: High Q: An Evening of Witty Revelations and RevelryGet ready for a night filled with laughter, trivia, and friendly competition at High Q, a fun and engaging pub quiz like no other! Held in the heart of Bangalore, this quiz night promises an interactive and lively atmosphere where friends, colleagues, and trivia enthusiasts can come together to showcase their knowledge.With 5-6 exciting rounds, High Q covers a range of topics designed to challenge, entertain, and spark conversation. From General Knowledge to Sports, Pop Culture, and more, each round is carefully crafted to keep you on your toes and keep the fun flowing all night long. Whether you're a trivia pro or a casual player, there’s something for everyone!So grab your team, order your favorite drinks, and get ready for an unforgettable night of wit, charm, and a whole lot of high-quality fun!Highlights:5-6 diverse rounds covering General Knowledge, Sports, Pop Culture, and more.Fun, interactive, and engaging format that keeps everyone involved.Perfect for teams of friends, colleagues, or solo participants looking for some trivia action.A lively atmosphere with plenty of opportunities for banter, laughter, and socializing.Whether you’re a trivia enthusiast or just looking to have some fun with friends, High Q is your go-to pub quiz for a night to remember!

location.address: 4th Floor, Magrath road, Garuda Mall Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India
